EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-09-19-CAE-Ignite.ES-2017-09-19-CAE-Ignite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Join Us for Dinner at Microsoft Ignite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/activate-your-hybrid-cloud-microsoft-ignite/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Hosted by Jeff Irvin, AVP of Commercial Sales, we invite you to join your peers for a Community Networking Event on the second evening of Microsoft Ignite!
Turbonomic Community Networking Dinner <[[https://turbonomic.com/activate-your-hybrid-cloud-microsoft-ignite/]]>
Marlow's Tavern Pointe Orlando, 9101 International Drive, Orlando, FL 32819 Tuesday, September 26th, 7:00 PM EDT Reserve Your Spot Today! <[[https://turbonomic.com/activate-your-hybrid-cloud-microsoft-ignite/]]>
Please reach out to catherine.kellogg@turbonomic.com or your account executives for any further questions.
We can't wait to see you there!
Cheers,
Your friends at Turbonomic
